main(String[]) - Static method in class MultiMediaMessage

main(String[]) - Static method in class Verificator
main() method used for controlling purposes
Message - Class in <Unnamed>
An abstract class working as a template for all messages - the idea is that for different versions of this app (e.g.: "mobile", "mobile-lite", "desktop") there might be different types for available options i.e. for "mobile-lite" it will be possible to use text messages only, and "mobile" will handle all the types.
Message(String, List<String>, String) - Constructor for class Message
A simple constructor with no overloading
MultiMediaMessage - Class in <Unnamed>
The idea is to allow to transfer not only textual data (it needs to have some modification in the future - i.e.: allowing .png files to be passed)
MultiMediaMessage(String, List<String>, String) - Constructor for class MultiMediaMessage
No need for any extra fields, we can use parent's constructor
